title: Episode 5: What's a political poll got to do with it?
itunes:author: Daniel Laurison, Larry Jacobs, Jamie Weinstein, Lauren Maffeo
description: Contributor(s): Daniel Laurison, Larry Jacobs, Jamie Weinstein, Lauren Maffeo | This episode, we take a look at what political polling can tell us about democratic participation, public policy, and political priorities.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Daniel Laurison, Larry Jacobs, Jamie Weinstein, Lauren Maffeo | This episode, we take a look at what political polling can tell us about democratic participation, public policy, and political priorities.
